ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... day? No kidding, I ve decided to drop the subject, Ill never give up my bard because he is a role playing fiend, and a money maker.. Bard Equation: People
ygData.messageBody:
>The topic "Hey this sounded interesting.." has incited a riot! I have not
>seen such an aggressive thread in weeks here...and with over 60 posts a
day?


No kidding, I ve decided to drop the subject, Ill never give up my bard
because he is a role playing fiend, and a money maker..

Bard Equation:
People + Bard + Real Songs = Surprised/Interested People + Money

In one concert I have 51P. Not a bad haul for singing and strumming the
lute. I expect more similar results when I start having people hand out
free beer I will make.

-Orchestro
